prompts: Create a small fire-type Pokemon that looks like a cute chick with bright orange feathers.
Generate a charming Pokemon with a round body and fiery personality, perfect for a starter.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a baby bird, with vibrant colors and energetic features.
Imagine a playful creature with orange fluff and a cheerful expression, ideal for adventures.
Design a fire-type Pokemon that has a unique blend of orange and yellow, giving off warmth.
Give me a Pokemon that stands out with its adorable features and fiery capabilities.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of fire, with soft feathers and a friendly aura.
